Sentencas: Through the combination of the current models of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) and thermophotovoltaic cells (TPVCs), a new model of the hybrid device composed of an SOFC, a regenerator, and a TPVC with integrated back surface reflector (BSR) is proposed.
Titulo: Efficiently exploiting the waste heat in solid oxide fuel cell by means of thermophotovoltaic cell

Sentencas: Analytical expressions for the power output and efficiency of two subsystems and hybrid device are derived.
Titulo: Efficiently exploiting the waste heat in solid oxide fuel cell by means of thermophotovoltaic cell

Sentencas: The relations between the performance of the TPVC and the operating current density of the SOFC in the hybrid device are revealed.
Titulo: Efficiently exploiting the waste heat in solid oxide fuel cell by means of thermophotovoltaic cell

Sentencas: The performance characteristics of the hybrid device are discussed in detail.
Titulo: Efficiently exploiting the waste heat in solid oxide fuel cell by means of thermophotovoltaic cell

Sentencas: The maximum power output density is calculated.
Titulo: Efficiently exploiting the waste heat in solid oxide fuel cell by means of thermophotovoltaic cell

Sentencas: The optimally operating region of the hybrid device is determined, compared with the performance of the SOFC in the hybrid device.
Titulo: Efficiently exploiting the waste heat in solid oxide fuel cell by means of thermophotovoltaic cell

Sentencas: The choice criteria of some key parameters are given.
Titulo: Efficiently exploiting the waste heat in solid oxide fuel cell by means of thermophotovoltaic cell

Sentencas: Moreover, it is proved that the proposed model can exploit the waste heat produced in SOFCs more efficiently than other SOFC-based hybrid systems.
Titulo: Efficiently exploiting the waste heat in solid oxide fuel cell by means of thermophotovoltaic cell
Efficiently exploiting the waste heat in solid oxide fuel cell by means of thermophotovoltaic cell
